flavorText: She collects only the choicest of deaths.

foreignData.flavorText: Sie sammelt nur die auserlesensten Todesfälle.
foreignData.name: Abscheuliche Kuratorin
foreignData.text:
Ausschlachten (Wenn diese Kreatur ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Kreatur opfern.)
Bedrohlich
Wenn die Abscheuliche Kuratorin eine Kreatur ausschlachtet, zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl mit Manabetrag 3 oder weniger, die du nicht kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText: Solo se queda con las muertes de primera.
foreignData.name: Conservadora aborrecible
foreignData.text:
Aprovechar. (Cuando esta criatura entre al campo de batalla, puedes sacrificar una criatura.)
Amenaza.
Cuando la Conservadora aborrecible aproveche una criatura, destruye la criatura objetivo que no controlas con valor de maná de 3 o menos.

foreignData.flavorText: Elle collectionne uniquement les morts les plus somptueuses.
foreignData.name: Conservatrice répugnante
foreignData.text:
Exploitation (Quand cette créature arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez sacrifier une créature.)
Menace
Quand la Conservatrice répugnante exploite une créature, détruisez une créature ciblée que vous ne contrôlez pas avec une valeur de mana inférieure ou égale à 3.

foreignData.flavorText: Colleziona solo le morti di prima scelta.
foreignData.name: Sovrintendente Raccapricciante
foreignData.text:
Sfruttare (Quando questa creatura entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi sacrificare una creatura.)
Minacciare
Quando la Sovrintendente Raccapricciante sfrutta una creatura, distruggi una creatura bersaglio che non controlli con valore di mana pari o inferiore a 3.

foreignData.flavorText: 彼女が収集するのは最上級の死のみ。
foreignData.name: 毒々しい学芸員
foreignData.text:
濫用（このクリーチャーが戦場に出たとき、あなたはクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げてもよい。）
威迫
毒々しい学芸員がクリーチャー１体を濫用したとき、あなたがコントロールしておらずマナ総量が３以下のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを破壊する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゴルゴン・ウィザード

foreignData.name: 혐오스러운 관장
foreignData.text:
수탈 (이 생물이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 생물 한 개를 희생할 수 있다.)
호전적
혐오스러운 관장이 생물을 수탈할 때, 당신이 조종하지 않으며 마나 값이 3 이하인 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Ela coleciona apenas as melhores mortes.
foreignData.name: Curadora Repugnante
foreignData.text:
Aproveitar (Quando esta criatura entra no campo de batalha, você pode sacrificar uma criatura.)
Ameaçar
Quando Curadora Repugnante se aproveitar de uma criatura, destrua a criatura alvo que você não controla com valor de mana igual ou inferior a 3.

foreignData.flavorText: Она собирает только самые изысканные смерти.
foreignData.name: Омерзительная Смотрительница
foreignData.text:
Угнетение (Когда это существо выходит на поле битвы, вы можете пожертвовать существо.)
Угроза
Когда Омерзительная Смотрительница угнетает существо, уничтожьте целевое существо не под вашим контролем с мановой ценностью не более 3.

foreignData.flavorText: 她只收集最精选的死者。
foreignData.name: 恶憎监管妖
foreignData.text:
榨取（当此生物进战场时，你可以牺牲一个生物。）
威慑
当恶憎监管妖榨取生物时，消灭目标不由你操控且法术力值等于或小于3的生物。

foreignData.flavorText: 她只收集最精選的死者。
foreignData.name: 惡憎監管妖
foreignData.text:
搾取（當此生物進戰場時，你可以犧牲一個生物。）
威懾
當惡憎監管妖搾取生物時，消滅目標不由你操控且魔法力值等於或小於3的生物。

name: Loathsome Curator
originalText:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
Menace
When Loathsome Curator exploits a creature, destroy target creature you don't control with mana value 3 or less.

rulings.text: A creature with exploit “exploits a creature” when the controller of the exploit ability sacrifices a creature as that ability resolves.
You choose whether to sacrifice a creature and which creature to sacrifice as the exploit ability resolves.
You can sacrifice the creature with exploit if it's still on the battlefield. This will cause its other ability to trigger.

If the creature with exploit isn't on the battlefield as the exploit ability begins to resolve, you won't get any bonus from the creature with exploit, even if you sacrifice a creature. Because the creature with exploit isn't on the battlefield, its other triggered ability won't trigger.
You can't sacrifice more than one creature to any one exploit ability.

text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
Menace
When Loathsome Curator exploits a creature, destroy target creature you don't control with mana value 3 or less.
